channel.title: [REQ HELP] How to add NPC Attack emotes on a rune fusion client [REQ HELP]
channel.description:
:confused: How and where do i add npc attack emotes on a rune fusion client. Every time a npc attacks me e.g. goblin NPC Id 100 attacks me its distorted and the npc crunches up and attacks me how would i change this, Thank you very much for reading this :confused:
:o
